author: Christopher North
text: 'Really good food. Fast delivery. 4 stars bc it is really expensive!'

author: Rick Simon
text: 'I ordered pork. It definitely wasn’t pork. Hard to say what’s worse
column5: the taste of disappointment or mystery meat.'

text: '10 min wait time

author: Miss Vee
text: 'Bland and insipid.\nOrdered Chicken and Cashews expecting it to be in a clear sauce. Came with a heavy brown sauce. Yuck. …'

author: chris kay
text: 'Best Chineese food in HB .'

author: Ralf274
text: 'Always good food and service.'

author: Ej Carannante
text: 'Loved the chicken and broccoli.'

author: Rafael Hernandez
text: 'Food is good not great. Delivery guy left our food on the front stoop and didn’t even bother ringing the bell or calling. Just texted
column5: and I didn’t see the text till ten minutes later...unacceptable!'

author: A McGowan
text: 'We placed an order on line and never received it. Called them several times with no answer. Very disappointing.'

author: Tony Enrico
text: 'Delicious and great people

author: suresh jain
text: 'I am a vegetarian
column5: found choice of food. Quality and taste was good. Satisfied with service. Good Ambience.'

author: Rhett Colon
text: 'Great and yummy food
column5: I love the character this place has
column6: and the workers were very friendly. Will surely come back.'

author: Vicky González
text: "Good service just don't like the beef broccoli white rice the meat is to small"

author: Barney Lynch
text: 'Excellent service from very friendly staff

author: Joe Minuti
text: 'Good food at great prices.'

author: Glenn Coogan
text: 'Great Ribs

author: Melanie Tam
text: 'Typical Chinese take out. I called to place an order for pick up and they told me to come in ten minutes. So I did that
column5: but still had to wait another 15 minutes. Even so
column6: I’d still come back if I’m craving some greasy takeout food. You can’t beat the price of the lunch special ($6.50)

author: Alicia Ray
text: "Quaint little Chinese food spot. The food is fairly good
column5: the best around the area that I have had so far. I've come here a few times and everything is fairly consistent the food taste
column6: & service. Service here is always great. There is no …"

text:

author: Jon Cooper
text: 'Delicious Ma Po tofu broccoli. No spicy nogh... so get hot oil on the side.Delightful young lady a the front.'

author: Konstantin Milovic
text: 'I could not even give it a one.  Sorry had too or would not take review but had to warn people.  The worst food I ever tasted.  BBQ beef burnt and must have been dipped in a bucket of salt. …'

author: Colleen Zelaya
text: 'Best chinese food in Hoboken. Also very nice people who work at counter. Ive tasted alot chinese restaurants this one is  by far the best'

text: 'The food was nasty and burnt Nd they didn’t give no duck sauce.'

text: 'Very good Chinese food'

text: 'It is a giid food'

author: Ken Yung
text: 'Probably the best place for Chinese food around this area. Have traditional Chinese food and also American chinese food.'

author: Rosalind Candelaria
text: 'Whoever took our order took it wrong i ordered combinations with fried rice got alacarte with white rice the shrimp and scallops in garlic sauce was only veggies
column5: when i called to fix it i was yelled at and hung up on
column6: this was the only time it was this horrible
column7: but that was enough for me.'

author: David Tsai
text: "Typical Chinese takeout restaurant
column5: but it's one of the best in Hoboken. The also make off-menu dishes
column6: just tell them what you want."

author: Gordon Myers
text: 'NO STARS.. The worst ever.. First time for delivery. S/S Soup was like watered down ketchup thickened.  Lo Mein
column5: flat no taste and cold. General Tsao\'s chicken was like hard balls of fried chicken stuck together with strawberry jam.  Had to "pitch" everything or suffer later at night...Never again.'

author: Mark W
text: 'Food is very blahhhh'

author: adam decicco
text: 'Friendly staff. Great food. Best budget Chinese in town'

author: Sean Haptmann
text: "One of those places that leaves their menus littered all over your building after they're able to get access.  While this bothers me as a scummy way to market themselves
column5: I tried their food to be fair.  It was the worst of all Chinese …"

author: M E
text: 'Unhealthy fast Chinese food not bad not good either'

author: gabrielle garzotto
text: 'Great food
column5: favorite Chinese ever. Fried Pork Dumplings are Delicous!!'

author: maryfitzzz
text: "I order from here all the time.  The only complaint I have is the females work too hard.  The food is great and reasonable.  Don't pass this place up.\n1210 hudson"

author: paulo Somlo
text: "In 5 days 2 x they delivered the wrong food ... soda always hot .... the biggest problem it's I have 30 min lunch .. than for the 2x I have no food and no time to eat because of them.. ridiculous  money tossed on garbage .. and the woman …"

author: Vishal
text: 'Quick and friendly service. Also their menu has a wide variety.'

author: Arif A
text: 'Great environment and Tuesday nights are the best.'

text: "I'm just saying that their sesame chicken is bangin' 10/10 I would recommend this place every time"

text: 'great food! the salt and pepper shrimp and squid is awesome!!!'

text: 'Food is always fresh and great prices'

author: Julia Montgomery
text: 'Yummy.  Very nice people

author: Gilbert Sandoval
text: 'The food was real good. My first time here in new jersey. I was glad to have found this place. The price was inexpesive and the staff was friendly.'

author: Nick Walker
text: 'Good inexpensive food. Quick service.'
